content: this beautiful adalia hat is the perfect match to the adalia scarf it is made with lion brand mandala yarn and is available in several sizes from newborn to adult large this pattern is one of the november contributions to the 2022 hat of the month cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 67-231 yds of category 3 light weight yarn i used lion brand mandala in the genie colorway * size h mm furls streamline sagittarius crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
